member.name: T:RudichChhantel_assignment.CommandSlicing
member.summary: Factory class that creates command objects based on command name. Implements the Factory Design Pattern.

member.name: M:RudichChhantel_assignment.CommandSlicing.Create(System.String,System.String[],BOOSE.ICanvas)
member.summary: Creates a CanvasCommand object based on the command name.
member.param: The name of the command (e.g., "circle", "moveto")
Array of parameter strings for the command
The canvas object on which commands will be executed
member.returns: A CanvasCommand object of the appropriate type
member.exception: Thrown when command name is not recognized

member.name: T:RudichChhantel_assignment.CustomCanvas
member.summary: Custom implementation of the Canvas class that handles actual drawing operations. Extends BOOSE.Canvas and implements drawing methods using GDI+.

member.name: F:RudichChhantel_assignment.CustomCanvas.bitmap
member.summary: The bitmap surface on which all drawings are rendered

member.name: F:RudichChhantel_assignment.CustomCanvas.graphics
member.summary: Graphics object used to draw on the bitmap

member.name: F:RudichChhantel_assignment.CustomCanvas.pen
member.summary: Current pen used for drawing operations

member.name: F:RudichChhantel_assignment.CustomCanvas.currentX
member.summary: Current X coordinate of the drawing cursor

member.name: F:RudichChhantel_assignment.CustomCanvas.currentY
member.summary: Current Y coordinate of the drawing cursor

member.name: P:RudichChhantel_assignment.CustomCanvas.Xpos
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the CustomCanvas class. Creates a bitmap of specified dimensions and sets up drawing tools.
member.param: Width of the canvas in pixels
Height of the canvas in pixels

member.name: M:RudichChhantel_assignment.CustomCanvas.Circle(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Draws a circle at the current cursor position.
member.param: Radius of the circle in pixels
True to draw a filled circle, false for outline only

member.name: M:RudichChhantel_assignment.CustomCanvas.Rect(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Draws a rectangle at the current cursor position.
member.param: Width of the rectangle in pixels
Height of the rectangle in pixels
True to draw a filled rectangle, false for outline only

member.name: M:RudichChhantel_assignment.CustomCanvas.getBitmap
member.summary: Gets the bitmap object containing all drawings.
member.returns: The bitmap object as a generic object type

member.name: M:RudichChhantel_assignment.CustomCanvas.MoveTo(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Moves the drawing cursor to the specified coordinates without drawing.
member.param: X coordinate in pixels
Y coordinate in pixels

member.name: M:RudichChhantel_assignment.CustomCanvas.Clear
member.summary: Clears the entire canvas with white color.

member.name: M:RudichChhantel_assignment.CustomCanvas.Reset
member.summary: Resets the canvas to initial state. Sets cursor to (0,0) and pen to default black color.

member.name: M:RudichChhantel_assignment.CustomCanvas.SetColour(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the pen color using RGB values.
member.param: Red component (0-255)
Green component (0-255)
Blue component (0-255)

member.name: M:RudichChhantel_assignment.CustomCanvas.DrawTo(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Draws a line from current cursor position to specified coordinates. Updates cursor position to the end point.
member.param: Target X coordinate
Target Y coordinate

member.name: T:RudichChhantel_assignment.DrawTo
member.summary: Command class that draws a line from current position to specified position. Also updates the cursor position to the end point.

member.name: F:RudichChhantel_assignment.DrawTo.x
member.summary: Target X coordinate

member.name: F:RudichChhantel_assignment.DrawTo.y
member.summary: Target Y coordinate

member.name: M:RudichChhantel_assignment.DrawTo.#ctor(BOOSE.ICanvas,System.String[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the DrawTo class.
member.param: The canvas on which to draw
Array containing x and y coordinates

member.name: M:RudichChhantel_assignment.DrawTo.Set(BOOSE.StoredProgram,System.String)
member.summary: Stores the program reference and parameter string for later compilation.
member.param: The StoredProgram this command belongs to
Parameter string (format: "x,y")

member.name: M:RudichChhantel_assignment.DrawTo.Compile
member.summary: Parses and validates the X and Y coordinates. Ensures coordinates are valid numbers and positive values.

member.name: M:RudichChhantel_assignment.DrawTo.CheckParameters(System.String[])
member.summary: Validates that exactly 2 parameters (x and y) are provided.
member.param: Array of parameter strings
member.exception: Thrown when parameter count is not 2

member.name: M:RudichChhantel_assignment.DrawTo.Execute
member.summary: Executes the draw line operation and updates cursor position.

member.summary: Target Y coordinate

Parameter string (format: "x,y")

member.summary: Parses and validates the X and Y coordinates. Ensures coordinates are valid numbers and positive values.

member.name: T:RudichChhantel_assignment.MyCanvas
member.summary: Singleton class that manages a single canvas instance throughout the application. Implements the Singleton Design Pattern to ensure only one canvas exists.

member.name: F:RudichChhantel_assignment.MyCanvas.instance
member.summary: The single instance of MyCanvas (null until first access)

member.name: F:RudichChhantel_assignment.MyCanvas.canvas
member.summary: The CustomCanvas object that handles actual drawing

member.name: M:RudichChhantel_assignment.MyCanvas.#ctor
member.summary: Private constructor prevents external instantiation. Canvas is created later via SetCanvas method.

member.name: M:RudichChhantel_assignment.MyCanvas.GetInstance
member.summary: Gets the singleton instance of MyCanvas. Creates the instance on first call (lazy initialization).

member.name: M:RudichChhantel_assignment.MyCanvas.GetCanvas
member.summary: Gets the Canvas object for drawing operations.

member.name: M:RudichChhantel_assignment.MyCanvas.SetCanvas(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates and initializes the canvas with specified dimensions.
member.param: Width of the canvas in pixels
Height of the canvas in pixels

member.name: T:RudichChhantel_assignment.MyPen
member.summary: Command class that sets the pen color for subsequent drawing operations. Uses RGB color values (0-255).

member.name: F:RudichChhantel_assignment.MyPen.red
member.summary: Red component of the color (0-255)

member.name: F:RudichChhantel_assignment.MyPen.green
member.summary: Green component of the color (0-255)

member.name: F:RudichChhantel_assignment.MyPen.blue
member.summary: Blue component of the color (0-255)

member.name: M:RudichChhantel_assignment.MyPen.#ctor(BOOSE.ICanvas,System.String[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the MyPen class.
member.param: The canvas whose pen color will be changed
Array containing red, green, and blue values (0-255)

member.name: M:RudichChhantel_assignment.MyPen.Set(BOOSE.StoredProgram,System.String)
member.summary: Stores the program reference and parameter string for later compilation.
member.param: The StoredProgram this command belongs to
Parameter string (format: "r,g,b")

member.name: M:RudichChhantel_assignment.MyPen.Compile
member.summary: Parses and validates the RGB color values. Ensures all values are numbers in the range 0-255.
member.exception: Thrown when parameters are invalid or out of range

member.name: M:RudichChhantel_assignment.MyPen.CheckParameters(System.String[])
member.summary: Validates that exactly 3 parameters (red, green, blue) are provided.
member.param: Array of parameter strings
member.exception: Thrown when parameter count is not 3

member.name: M:RudichChhantel_assignment.MyPen.Execute
member.summary: Executes the pen color change operation.

member.name: M:RudichChhantel_assignment.Program.Main
member.summary: The main entry point for the application.

member.name: T:RudichChhantel_assignment.Rudich_Chhantel
member.summary: Main form for the Drawing Application. Handles user input, command execution, and display of drawings.

member.name: F:RudichChhantel_assignment.Rudich_Chhantel.canvas
member.summary: The canvas on which all drawings are rendered

member.name: F:RudichChhantel_assignment.Rudich_Chhantel.slicing
member.summary: Factory for creating command objects

member.name: F:RudichChhantel_assignment.Rudich_Chhantel.program
member.summary: StoredProgram to manage command execution

member.name: M:RudichChhantel_assignment.Rudich_Chhantel.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Rudich_Chhantel form. Sets up the canvas, command factory, and stored program.

member.name: M:RudichChhantel_assignment.Rudich_Chhantel.pictureBox1_Paint(System.Object,System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the Paint event for the output picture box. Displays the canvas bitmap on the screen.
member.param: The source of the event (picture box control)
Paint event arguments containing graphics context

member.name: M:RudichChhantel_assignment.Rudich_Chhantel.Run_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Executes commands when the Run button is clicked. Handles both single command execution (from singleCommandBox) and multiple command execution (from commandBox).
member.param: The source of the event (Run button)
Event arguments

member.name: M:RudichChhantel_assignment.Rudich_Chhantel.ExecuteCommand(System.String)
member.summary: Parses and executes a single command string. Splits the command into name and parameters, creates the command object using the factory, and executes it on the canvas.
member.param: The command string to execute. Format: "commandName param1,param2,..." Example: "circle 50" or "moveto 100,150"
member.exception: Thrown when command name is not recognized or parameters are invalid

member.name: M:RudichChhantel_assignment.Rudich_Chhantel.Enter_KeyDown(System.Object,System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the KeyDown event for executing commands with Shift+Enter. Provides keyboard shortcut alternative to clicking the Run button.
member.param: The source of the event (text box control)
Key event arguments containing information about the pressed key

member.name: M:RudichChhantel_assignment.Rudich_Chhantel.aboutToolStripMenuItem_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Displays the About dialog with application information. Shows version, author, supported commands, and design patterns used.
member.param: The source of the event (About menu item)
Event arguments

member.name: M:RudichChhantel_assignment.Rudich_Chhantel.saveImageToolStripMenuItem_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Saves the current drawing as a PNG image file. Opens a save file dialog and exports the canvas bitmap.
member.param: The source of the event (Save Image menu item)
Event arguments
member.exception: Thrown when file save operation fails

member.name: M:RudichChhantel_assignment.Rudich_Chhantel.exitToolStripMenuItem_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Closes the application.
member.param: Event arguments

member.name: M:RudichChhantel_assignment.Rudich_Chhantel.loadImageToolStripMenuItem_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Loads an image file from disk and displays it on the canvas. Opens a file dialog to select PNG, JPG, or BMP image files. The loaded image is drawn at the top-left corner of the canvas.
member.param: The source of the event (Load Image menu item)
Event arguments
member.exception: Thrown when image file cannot be loaded or is in an unsupported format

member.name: M:RudichChhantel_assignment.Rudich_Chhantel.newToolStripMenuItem_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Creates a new drawing by clearing the canvas and all text boxes. Resets the application to initial state, ready for a new drawing session.
member.param: The source of the event (New menu item)
Event arguments

member.summary: Clean up any resources being used.

member.name: T:RudichChhantel_assignment.ShapeCircle
member.summary: Command class that draws a circle on the canvas. Implements the Command Pattern via CanvasCommand base class.

member.name: F:RudichChhantel_assignment.ShapeCircle.fillcircle
member.summary: Indicates whether the circle should be filled or outline only

member.name: F:RudichChhantel_assignment.ShapeCircle.radius
member.summary: Radius of the circle in pixels

member.name: M:RudichChhantel_assignment.ShapeCircle.#ctor(BOOSE.ICanvas,System.String[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ShapeCircle class.
member.param: The canvas on which to draw
Array containing radius and optional filled parameter

member.name: M:RudichChhantel_assignment.ShapeCircle.Set(BOOSE.StoredProgram,System.String)
member.summary: Stores the program reference and parameter string for later compilation. Part of the two-phase execution model (Set → Compile → Execute).
member.param: The StoredProgram this command belongs to
Parameter string to be parsed during compilation

member.name: M:RudichChhantel_assignment.ShapeCircle.Compile
member.summary: Parses and validates the parameters stored during Set(). Performs error checking and throws descriptive exceptions if parameters are invalid.

member.name: M:RudichChhantel_assignment.ShapeCircle.CheckParameters(System.String[])
member.summary: Validates that the correct number of parameters have been provided.
member.param: Array of parameter strings
member.exception: Thrown when parameter count is incorrect

member.name: M:RudichChhantel_assignment.ShapeCircle.Execute
member.summary: Executes the circle drawing command on the canvas.

member.name: T:RudichChhantel_assignment.ShapeRectangle
member.summary: Command class that draws a rectangle on the canvas.

member.name: F:RudichChhantel_assignment.ShapeRectangle.width
member.summary: Width of the rectangle in pixels

member.name: F:RudichChhantel_assignment.ShapeRectangle.height
member.summary: Height of the rectangle in pixels

member.name: F:RudichChhantel_assignment.ShapeRectangle.filled
member.summary: Indicates whether the rectangle should be filled or outline only

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ShapeRectangle class.
member.param: The canvas on which to draw
Array containing width, height, and optional filled parameter

member.name: M:RudichChhantel_assignment.ShapeRectangle.Set(BOOSE.StoredProgram,System.String)
member.summary: Stores the program reference and parameter string for later compilation.
member.param: The StoredProgram this command belongs to
Parameter string (format: "width,height" or "width,height,filled")

member.name: M:RudichChhantel_assignment.ShapeRectangle.Compile
member.summary: Parses and validates the rectangle dimensions and filled flag. Ensures dimensions are positive values.

member.name: M:RudichChhantel_assignment.ShapeRectangle.CheckParameters(System.String[])
member.summary: Validates that at least 2 parameters (width and height) are provided.
member.param: Array of parameter strings
member.exception: Thrown when parameter count is less than 2

member.name: M:RudichChhantel_assignment.ShapeRectangle.Execute
member.summary: Executes the rectangle drawing command on the canvas.

member.name: T:RudichChhantel_assignment.ApplicationConfiguration
member.summary: Bootstrap the application configuration.

member.name: M:RudichChhantel_assignment.ApplicationConfiguration.Initialize
member.summary: Bootstrap the application as follows: global::System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles(); global::System.Windows.Forms.Application.SetCompatibleTextRenderingDefault(false); global::System.Windows.Forms.Application.SetHighDpiMode(HighDpiMode.SystemAware);
